website_summaries.verdict: Outstanding value, as it ships with the streaming box, a remote control unit, and a Bluetooth mini keyboard.
pros: Features a quad-core CPU to maintain a high level of streaming video performance
Supports both WiFi and Bluetooth wireless connectivity
cons: Longevity is a question mark, as all of the components seem to consist of brittle and thin plastic

customer_reviews.title: Great Android Box.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good Android box and believe me I have tried several. My only issue is that the remote is slow so I had to use my air mouse remote from the old Android Box I had. It came with a mini key board but the direction to how to use it is terrible. But other than that the actual Box is nice and easy to understand. UPDATED REVIEW. Had to send it back because it kept freezing and then get very hot.
customer_reviews.author: Terrance G.

customer_reviews.title: Great decide at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Received this box tonight the remote was great.Didn’t found any issues with it so far. The interface is very smooth and silky without any lags,When you first connect via HDMI, the picture is super clear, I tried to used it work with 4K HD movie, the quality of picture is super fantastic! The round appearance and LED display make it very beauty on the entertainment center.This box has usb 3.0.it also as a digital audio output and also has a mini jack, hdmi port, sd card slot.Overall, I am happy with my purchase.Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Eliseo Nochez

customer_reviews.title: Seemed like a good deal
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fit and finish but it did not work and had to return it. Install was easy and it updated with no issues. After install, it would sit there hung with a picture of the device on the TV until turned off. Contacted Amazon and returned it with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Eppley

customer_reviews.title: oh im loving it..
customer_reviews.text: this was one of best purchases.. comes unlock rooted. uninstalled the cheapo kodi it came with and installed real kodi and a few other apps. anydesk remote works! unlike uncles $99 google certified 9.1 he bought i can only use teamviewer to see and have him click as i cant click. im able to help mom remotely and click things if she needs help i dont have to drive 25 miles.
customer_reviews.author: Arnold G.

customer_reviews.title: Less than I hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: When I looked at the product I was hopeful that this would be able to do what I needed it to do. The box will not install Disney Plus (i wanted to have for my grandkids) Amazon Prime is not working properly on the box even with a clean install. Netflix works most of the time but is faster on my PlayStation than this box. Tubi worked for a day now it just crashes. I am going to give this one more try but honestly am very disappointed with this purchase. I think it would have been less stress just to purchase a new Smart Tv.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great small box
customer_reviews.text: Setup is easy and takes around 10 min. Successfully downloaded all needed applications from the Play Store and directly from the Internet. WI-FI connection is stable and works without interruptions. The box has good quality video stream through HDMI port, 2 USB ports, 2.0 and 3.0 and built-in Bluetooth. The remote keyboard connects through Bluetooth and makes it much easier to type and surf the Internet. The remote control can control both the TV box and TV Set (Power, Sound and some other basic functions). I’m absolutely recommending this small box since it work as like champ for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Box For a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: This box is perfect for all your audio/video demands. You can add pretty much any third party apk to this box. The keyboard remote really comes on handy for typing the name of anything you want to find without using that annoying screen keyboard....will definitely be purchasing again and telling my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Everett J.

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Well I was really excited on buying this product but the remote really turn me down, it's not that powerful compared to Amazon's fire stick and you'd have to point at the android box for it to work. Packaging was good, but no batteries for the remote. It does have a feature for voice recognition (not the remote thought) but dont know how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Himanshu

customer_reviews.title: Great all around device
customer_reviews.text: By far the smoothest running Android tv box that I’ve used so far. For the price you can’t beat it and it comes with the touchpad keyboard remote that makes navigating and typing a breeze. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: TyJuan Jones

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money or time
customer_reviews.text: This was a real disappointing endeavor. Android is not made to work without touch input. The keyboard that was supplied was a joke. The version of Android is OLD and does not update. Unable to use Google Assistant with this device. Cannot cast to this device. Overall a terrible user experience and I returned the product
customer_reviews.author: Christopher  Smith

customer_reviews.title: Weak signal
customer_reviews.text: Purchased high speed Internet for this box end up freezing on me every time watching a channel. Bad weather like rain or snow day channel’s don’t even work. Some days most of the channels doesn’t even work.
customer_reviews.author: Begum K. Nahar

customer_reviews.title: Old TV now 'smart' TV
customer_reviews.text: This Android TV Box is a good value for the price. Although the instructions are scant and in a miniscule font, the box is very easy to setup. I am glad I sprung for the set with the mini keyboard (with touchpad!) - highly recommended. It comes pre-loaded with a bunch of Android apps. I loaded 'Crackle' and it works OK. Now my old ‘dumb’ TV is ‘Smart’
customer_reviews.author: Fuzzy

customer_reviews.title: Not to bad.
customer_reviews.text: Its definitely not bad at all the best way to describe it is that it turns your TV into a computer in a way. You download from the play store and sign into your google account.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Drake

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ANDROID BOX AND KEYBOARD
customer_reviews.text: this is one of the best boxes in this range. works great, has great picture and is easy to customize. it is a very good deal and the keyboard makes it easy to type links in when you are downloading apps, etc. the seller is very responsive to emails and does the right thing! you can buy from him with confidence. good amazon experience!!
customer_reviews.author: tngolfer

customer_reviews.title: Remote Control is worse than a toy ir remote control
customer_reviews.text: Updated post: After working the seller, regarding my nonfunctional remote. I think it's a one of situation. The Seller worked with me to resolve my issues. They're really good. Old post: Remote stopped working within a month. I couldn't find any way to fix it. Posted a message and no response from the seller to assist.
customer_reviews.author: Cm

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt seem to hold up!
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for about a week. Not sure if the heat from device harms it or just doesnt hold up. The company was very willing to help. sent me a replacement but it also only worked well for a week. Might take another chance on them because of the company wanting to do what they could to correct the problem. company wanted to make things right and they just think I got two bad devices.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Newburn

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: I bought this box to stream .iso files from my server, but it's a no go. It takes 120 seconds to start playing the .iso, and when it does eventually play it's so jerky you cant watch it. My other streaming box has no such problems and its 3 years old, so it's not my setup. Do not purchase to play .iso files from a server!

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.

THIS IS NOT AN ANDROID TV BOX - IT IS LOADED ON A CELL PHONE PLATFORM - SO ALL SCREENS ARE OFF AND MOSTLY UNUSABLE. ALSO, KODI MAY BE LOADED SOMEWHERE IN THIS CELL PHONE BOX BUT IT UNUSABLE. DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME OR MONEY.

It looks like the picture and the shipping was bad it does play a whole movie the next one you want to watch something it won’t play just buffer and the one I got from eBay was fine so it’s just this one

customer_reviews.title: Good 4 movies, mirroring & iptv.
customer_reviews.text: Is perfect for watching movies off of and allows your old t.v. to do screen mirroring from your phone through DLNA. It comes rooted. Cons are it doesn't support live wallpapers and is difficult to move apps around, but you can probably fix if you throw on different OS. Remote is easy to program and i was able to program it to both the t.v. and soundbar. Amazon prime video is difficult to use on it, but perfect for iptv service.

I like streaming netflix, hulu,HBO, CBS access right from the Android tv box. I don't even have to use my smart tv apps. I like the decision tbe seller made of allowing me to keep the broken one and using the second one for free. I appreciated that. Thank you!

product_meta.title: Android TV Box 9.0,RK3318 Smart TV Box 2GB 16GB Support 2.4G 5.8G WiFi Bluetooth 4.1 with Mini Backlit Keyboard Ethernet LAN 3D 4K Video Android TV Player Google Mini PC Set Top TV Box
feature_bullets: 【Newest Android 9.0 OS】Android 9.0 OS and RK3318 Quad-core CPU supporting downloading the apps online from Google Play Store, to watch videos, play games, enjoy music, and so on, supporting various languages, It is the best choice for you to have the smooth experience to watch the video or play games.

【 2GB RAM & 16GB ROM】Transpeed android 9.0 tv box supply excellent memory (2GB+16GB) to let you download more movies, games or other files. Sit on the couch with your family and watch your favorite TV shows, movies,games or sporting events through hundreds of streaming apps

【2.4G/5.8G Wifi &BT 4.1】Android Tv box supports 2.4G/5.8G WiFi,if you like to use 5G wifi ,it exactly match your needs.Stable, Fast and High Quality WIFI signal,make sure enjoy a higher quality to browse websites, play games, run programs, watch movies .

【3D+4K & H.265】You can watch a 3D movie at home and no need go to the cinema, the tv box updated version support 4k and 3D function. H.265 Hardware decoding can save 50% of bandwidth resources, you can watch movies fluently. The 4K 1080i/p resolution is 4 times more than full HD, so you can see every detail of the screen is glossy.

【Free Mini Backlit Keyboard & Remote】Comes with remote and mini backlit keyboard which have 92 keys wireless qwerty keyboard, supporting multi-touch gesture and scrolling bar. Built-in ultra-sensitive mouse touch pad with 360-degree flip design. Infrared remote control let you enjoy your wonderful life which the wireless brings to you.It can works with PCs with Windows OS, MAC, Linux, Smart TVs, Android TV boxes, Rasberry PI and XBOX PS3 etc players.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars402 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
